description: Software Developer Intern at a product-based start-up with about 10 employees, on 2 different projects in teams of 2 – 3, mainly Android Applications in Java focusing on Bluetooth APIs
Internship as a part of the Practice School program of BITS Pilani University to provide students with an opportunity to work on industry projects, under the guidance of professional experts
Full-stack developer at a product-based software company with about 70 employees
Worked on 3 different projects in teams of 3 – 6, using skills from different domains such as web apps (Angular 5, Spring, Hibernate) and mobile apps (Android Development)
Mentor a new employee to train them and get them started with their tasks
